Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ğd-ḥr(?), a priest(?), with a lappet-wig and a beard(most of the head has broken away) and crossed arms in relief(worn) holding an incised adze and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the leg section is inscribed with rows of painted Hieroglyphs(worn); there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot(incomplete); a black deposit adheres to the figure.
